Title: Facebook OAuth authentication for WPF application
Description: This is a WPF sample application for Facebook OAuth authentication in C#. This application takes Facebook App Id and application permission scope (comma de-limited) as their input and provides Access Token & Expires in time in seconds as their output.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is a WPF sample application for Facebook OAuth authentication in C#. This application takes Facebook App Id and application permission scope (comma de-limited) as their input and provides Access Token & Expires in time in seconds as their output.
